column1: 10/10 - Great job identifying the production development function as a suitable candidate for scrum/sprint methodologies and providing a clear explanation of how it could operate in that context. Keep up the good work!

8 pts - Missing significant explanatory content. 

Your response provides a general understanding of scrum/sprint and kanban methodologies, but it lacks specific details on how they could operate for the chosen business functions. Consider providing more in-depth explanations and examples to strengthen your response.

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit.

Comment: Good attempt at explaining the poor fit of kanban for production development, but could be more specific about the limitations of kanban in this context. Keep up the good work!

10/10 - Great job identifying the production function as a suitable candidate for implementing kanban methodologies and providing a clear explanation of how it could benefit the process. Keep up the good work!

12 pts - Very complete and clear description of how kanban could operate. Great job explaining the benefits of kanban for the production function and providing specific details on how it could be implemented. Keep up the good work!

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit.

Comment: Good attempt at discussing the poor fit of scrum/sprint for the production function, but it could be more specific and clear. Keep up the good work!

5 pts - Selected bias is clearly relevant to this situation.

Great job identifying confirmation bias as a relevant cognitive bias for Jackson's decision-making process. Keep up the good work!

6 pts - Noticeable errors or misunderstanding in the definition

Your response mentioned confirmation bias, but the definition provided was not entirely clear. Remember that confirmation bias is the tendency to search for, interpret, and favor information that confirms one's pre-existing beliefs or hypotheses. Keep working on providing clear and concise definitions.
12 pts - Complete and clear description of possible problem. Great job in identifying the cognitive bias and providing a detailed explanation. Keep up the good work!

10 pts - Complete and clear description of possible step or action. Excellent job in providing detailed steps and actions for implementing agile methodologies in the production process. Keep up the good work!
